entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 a.m. EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy. Snow over eastern sections this afternoon. Amount 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow over eastern sections this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
